dependencies.description:
CD-HIT is a very widely used program for clustering and comparing
protein or nucleotide sequences.
dependencies.name: cdhit

dependencies.description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.
dependencies.name: muscle

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
USEARCH is a unique sequence analysis tool with thousands of users
world-wide. Note: A manual download is required for USEARCH when
@:11.0.667. Spack will search your current directory for the download
file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack can find
it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
dependencies.name: usearch

description:
ShortBRED is a system for profiling protein families of interest at very
high specificity in shotgun meta'omic sequencing data.
name: py-shortbred

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
